firstSection.title: New arrivals this season
firstSection.text: Sophisticated combinations and velvet tones are what you've been looking for this season. Time to explore

first.title: Quality
first.text: Our professionals work on the best equipment for sewing clothes of unprecedented quality

second.title: Speed
second.text: Thanks to the well-established system at Womazing, we can sew up to 20 products in our own workshops

three.title: Responsibility
three.text: We care about people and the planet. Waste-free production and comfortable working conditions - that's what Womazing is all about
